summary: [HBO] HD. The life and career of Barry Goldwater from his start as a hugely influential Arizona Senator to his tumultuous run for president in 1964.
cast: Julian Bond|Ben Bradlee|James Carville|Hillary Clinton|Walter Cronkite|Alfonse D'amato|John Dean|Al Franken|Barry Goldwater|Joanne Goldwater|Michael Goldwater|Peggy Goldwater-Clay|Ted Kennedy|Robert MacNeil|John McCain|Sandra Day O'Connor|Sally Quinn|Andrew Rooney|Bob Schieffer|Helen Thomas|Richard Viguerie|John Warner|George F. Will
title: Mr. Conservative: Goldwater on Goldwater
